name: BalanceFrom 24x24 Inch EVA Interlocking Foam Exercise Tile Mat – Non-Slip Puzzle Flooring for Home Gym, Fitness Studio, or Playroom with Multiple Thickness, Coverage Sizes and Color Options
short_description: Protective workout flooring: Durable, non-skid textured tiles protect floors while creating a comfortable workout space
Easy assembly: Lightweight puzzle pieces connect quickly and easily, and can be disassembled just as simply for quick storage
Versatile: The water-and noise-resistant design is easy-to-clean, great for use in garages, gyms, home fitness rooms, or play areas
Covers 24 square feet: Each tile measures 24” x 24” x 1/2”- thick from the highest point of the texture; Includes 6 tiles and 12 end borders for a polished look
High quality foam: High-density EVA foam provides excellent support and cushion
product_description: "Transform your home, gym, or daycare space into a safe, durable, and comfortable workout or play area with the BalanceFrom Foam Exercise Tiles. This 24-pack set features interlocking 24 x 24-inch foam tiles and 48 end borders, covering a total of 96 square feet to create a seamless, cushioned flooring surface. Crafted from 3/4-inch high-density EVA foam, these tiles provide excellent cushioning for your spine, hips, knees, and elbows, reducing impact on hard floors during exercise, gymnastics, play, or stretching. The double-sided anti-slip surfaces offer firm traction to prevent slipping while keeping the mat securely in place during fitness training or active play. Thanks to moisture-resistant technology, cleaning is fast and easy. Simply wipe with soap and water to maintain a hygienic space. The lightweight foam construction allows for quick assembly, repositioning, and portability, making it simple to adapt your space for workouts, playpen and playhouse areas, or temporary events. Each tile measures 24 x 24 x 0.75 inches, with a total set weight of 18 pounds, providing ample room coverage and durability for daily use. The gray color blends seamlessly with most interiors, offering a professional and neutral appearance for home gyms or playrooms in a daycare center. Whether you are creating a workout area, a children’s play space, or a multipurpose activity floor, the BalanceFrom Foam Exercise Tile Mats deliver comfort, safety, and long-lasting performance, making them the practical solution for protecting your floors and enhancing your space. "

product_description: The ProSource Kids Solid Puzzle Play Mat creates a brightly colored, comfortable and safe play area for children wherever you have hard floors. Colorful puzzle pieces and borders will help promote your baby’s brain growth and development, making it ideal for homes, child care providers, schools and churches. The gently textured surface provides a non-slip grip for extra safety and the 3/8-inch thick high-density EVA foam provides durable cushion for your child. It’s also water-resistant, making it easy to clean and keep free from odors. It covers a total of 36 square feet when fully assembled or if you prefer a smaller piece to make it convenient for your space, the 16 square feet can accommodate your needs when fully assembled. The mat can be customized by using only some of the tiles for smaller areas, or by purchasing an extra set to create a larger play area. Each tile is approximately 12 square inches and it comes with 24 border pieces for a finished look. Soft but firm interlocking pieces are easy and quick to assemble or take apart in case you need to quickly store it away or move it to another room. The lightweight play mat comes in a zippered bag which you can keep to transport or store your mat. This mat does not contain any toxic phthalates.
